titleStmt.title: Certaine deuout and godly petitions, commonly called, Iesus Psalter
Jesus psalter.
titleStmt.author: Whitford, Richard, fl. 1495-1555?, attributed name. aut

notesStmt.note: With woodcut on verso of first title page--STC.
In two parts. Part 2, "Godly contemplations for the vnlearned", is a series of 61 woodcuts.
Identified as STC 14565 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
